description: WUI Fire Research Data Path Configuration Template

aerotrak_bedroom.description: AeroTrak 9510 optical particle counter - Bedroom2 location
aerotrak_bedroom.notes: Size-resolved PM (0.5-25 µm), time shift: 2.16 min

aerotrak_kitchen.description: AeroTrak 9510 optical particle counter - Kitchen/Morning Room location
aerotrak_kitchen.notes: Size-resolved PM (0.5-25 µm), time shift: 5 min

dusttrak.description: TSI DustTrak DRX 8533 real-time aerosol monitor
dusttrak.notes: PM1, PM2.5, PM4, PM10, PM15, time shift: 7 min

miniams.description: Mini-AMS (Aerosol Mass Spectrometer) - Chemical species data
miniams.notes: Organic, Nitrate, Sulfate, Ammonium, Chloride (Burns 1-3 only)

quantaq_bedroom.notes: PM1, PM2.5, PM10, time shift: -2.97 min (Burns 4-10)

quantaq_kitchen.notes: PM1, PM2.5, PM10, time shift: 0 min (Burns 4-10)

smps.description: TSI SMPS 3938 - Scanning Mobility Particle Sizer

vaisala_th.description: Vaisala temperature and relative humidity sensors

notes: 1. Copy this file to 'data_config.json' in the repository root
2. Replace PATH_TO_YOUR_WUI_SMOKE_DATA_ROOT with your actual data directory
3. For Windows paths, use forward slashes (/) or double backslashes (\\)
- AeroTrak instruments have different time shifts (bedroom: 2.16 min, kitchen: 5 min)
- MiniAMS data only available for Burns 1-3
- PurpleAir data only available for Burns 6-10
- QuantAQ sensors only used for Burns 4-10
- Each instrument folder should contain the data files matching the file_pattern
